text: akave, nir um'mukattai tuya (islamiya) markkattin pakkame murrilum tiruppi nilainiruttuviraka! E(nta markkat)til allah manitarkalaip pataittano atuve avanutaiya (nilaiyana) iyarkai markkamakum; allahvin pataittalil marram illai atuve nilaiyana markkamakum. Anal manitaril perumpalor (itai) ariyamattarkal
